title: Dino--Draw's GOITOBER 2023 Art!
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:cosmonaut twilight=--]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
[[tabview]]
[[tab Day 1 - Chicago Spirit]]

++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 1 - Chicago Spirit]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/bVJzUqV.png]]

Chose [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/carroll-105-the-jabberwock Carrol #105: The Jabberwock] by [[*user GremlinWC]]! For my first GOITOBER piece! It was a fun read, and I am a sucker for face-stealing monsters. Interpreting its design was a real treat for my creature-design enjoying heart. 

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 2 - Ruiz Duchamp]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 2 - Ruiz Duchamp]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/M3F15qI.png]]

Eyyyyy it's this guy. I have no idea what he looks like so I improvised a scruffed looking bitch. Drew something moderately inspired by [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/nobody-dies Nobody Dies] by [[*user Randomini]] because the Cool War is something I read around last year and thinking was fun. My personal art "challenge" to myself was just 'keep it messy!' so I did very minimal cleanup and also just rough painted in the colors. because this man is a MESS.

I think the plot of the Cool War could've been avoided if Duchamp had spoken his plan aloud. "I'm going to change the status quo by killing Nobody!" like c'mon man. Buddy. Pal. I know you're going through shit but repeat that again slower to yourself.

[[/tab]]


[[tab Day 3 - Three Moons Initiative]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 3 - Three Moons Initiative]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/dozxIMJ.jpg]]

I was admittedly very exhausted today, so I elected to just sketch something based on the hub page! The concept of Three Moons is equal parts hilarious and interesting to me, and I'll be sure to check out some articles at a later date. 

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 4 - Nameless]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 4 - Nameless]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/4iGPG5P.png]]

I realized [[[ricky-vasquez |Vicky Vasquez]]] by [[*user mr-carbon]] and [[*user DrowningDutchman]] was in the Nameless tag and jumped on that like a feral dog. Checkmate fae, can't steal shit if there ain't shit to steal. I'm technically a day behind right now but shhhhhh I'll catch up gimme a bit. This ones art challenge thing was "draw in not your usual program" you I used Aggie as opposed to my usual Photoshop.

[[/tab]]


[[tab Day 5 - Fifthism]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 5 - Fifthism]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/1vj02lM.png]]

This time it's [[[a-pathetic-attempt-to-explain-fifthism |A Pathetic Attempt to Explain Fifthism]]] by [[*user chaucer345]]! I remember when the reading club did it a while back and reread it- it's a fun read!! annnddd im a sucker for the Wandsmen GOI as well.

[[/tab]]


[[tab Day 6 - Bones]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 6 - Bones]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/gyBBI6F.png]]

Take a shot I did another GOITOBER for an article I learned of via the reading club - I love you Ms Nessie Crocosquid I love you so much. This is based on (and the line of dialogue at the top is from) [[[gamers-against-kaiju |On The Internet Nobody Knows You're A Kaiju]]] by [[*user stormbreath]]!

[[/tab]]


[[tab Day 7 - Valravn]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 7 - Valravn]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/8xzKiJZ.png]]

EYYY IM FINALLY CAUGHT UP! Let's. Stay caught up.
This one is based on a scene from [[[scp-3452 |SCP-3452]]] by [[*user SYTYCFanon]] and [[*user Kilerpoyo]]!

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 8 - Sapphire]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 8 - Sapphire]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/q2gQ7kb.png]]

I really just wanted to render a gem prettily, because lighting is so so fun ;D this is just based on the general aesthetic we've got goin' on in that GOI with gemstones. 

[[/tab]]


[[tab Day 9 - Eric]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 9 - Eric]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/TSfEWYp.png]]

Just a simple sketch this time around of [[[scp-066 |SCP-066]]], for I didn't have too much energy going into this. Also I didn't know this lil guy got rewritten or maybe that red ball of yarn w/ the eyes was an off-site thing and I never knew. Anyways I liked when it turned into a kitty. 
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 10 - Pangloss]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 10 - Pangloss]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/Nunzv2P.png]]

And then I went all out in an aggie! First time inking something in full and it was actually kinda nice. Anyways- this is King Ragna from the PHENOMINAL [[[scp-7629 |SCP-7629]]] by [[*user WarriorofChaos]]! It is so so fucking cool with its worldbuilding and the DRAGONS HAVE AN ALPHABET! THERE'S AN IMAGE FOR IT TOO IT'S COOL AS FUCK. Please please please go read it it's so fun. It was fun to interpret the design of the Droganian King himself, what a pretty lookin' dergen :> 
[[/tab]]


[[tab Day 11 - Deer College]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 11 - Deer College]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/ZzqV1BO.png]]

This is Sandra and George from the [[[critter-profile-sandra-and-george |critter profile of the same name]]] by [[*user Uncle Nicolini]]. What cute little critters I sure hope nothing happens to them. Did just a sketch today because I got distracted by other art stuff and didn't have the energy to ink 'em or anything.
[[/tab]]


[[tab Day 12 - Grand Karcist Ion]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 12 - Grand Karcist Ion]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/R8VI1ek.png]]
{{//"When in its boundless rage, its eyes lock with that of Ion, the gesture is full of only understanding."//}}

A doodle based on [[[na-bestyje-przepis-jeden-kranca-wdech |To Craft a Monster // Breathe the End]]] by [[*user KubKac]] and [[*user Ralliston]]!
[[/tab]]


[[tab Day 13 - Parawatch]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 13 - Parawatch]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/Z2AQJFW.jpg]]
CRAWLS OUT OF THE DEPTHS OF HELL. HI IM NOT DEAD I WAS VERY BUSY.

This was a quick doodle based on a scene from [[[heart-of-the-beast |Heart of the Beast]]] by [[*user aismallard]]! That tale and the lil mini series its from is so so fun. 
[[/tab]]


[[tab Day 14 - Isabel V]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 14 - Isabel V]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/fzjOG4X.jpg]]

Just a quick, silly little doodle of the lass herself!
[[/tab]]


[[tab Day 15 - MADAO]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 15 - MADAO]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/72igokC.jpg]]

Decided to just doodle the little insignia that's in their GOI formats cause I thought it looked pwetty. 
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 16 - Vikander Kneed]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 16 - Vikander Kneed]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/sLaaVf8.jpg]]

[[[scp-7806 |SCP-7806]]] by [[*user HarryBlank]] sure was something to read KJHDFGKJHDFGKDHF so here have. This drawing. 
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 17 - The Black Queen]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 18 - The Black Queen]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/KD6GiMH.jpg]]

General drawing based on the hub page/gen information on the Black Queen! Really banger concept. Go girl, make your daddy issues everyone's problem!!
[[/tab]]


[[tab Day 18 - Thilo Zwist]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 18 - The Black Queen]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/G8BqXCl.jpg]]

CARTOON OLD MAN! ME SCRAMBLING TO CATCH UP
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 19 - Wilson's Wildlife]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 19 - Wilson's Wildlife]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/N8kRBr1.png]]

A borderline shitpost and homage to an inside joke between me and some friends in an scp ttrpg game. and also a toast to learning of Potatoes in that game sending me and another player on a 3 AM deep dive of the dado tag. the dado tag at 3 AM is an experience. Especially when you were blind going into it.
Anyways yeah the wonderful critters of [[[critter-profile-potoooooooo |Potoooooooooo]]] by [[*user HunterDog]] and [[[critter-profile-the-polar-bear |The Polar Bear]]] by [[*user DrAnnoyingDog]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 20 - TotleighSoft]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 20 - TotleighSoft]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/5Qwjdr7.png]]


I mean this from the bottom of my heart, [[[dyfscp0012 |what the fuck did I just read. i am deeply unsettled yet mildly cackling. what]]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 21 - Robert Bumaro]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 21 - Robert Bumaro]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/xzLHtsm.jpg]]


A simple lil doodle based on one of [[*user SunnyClockwork]]'s Bumaro designs!
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 22 - Alagadda]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 22 - Alagadda]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/q7RCr53.jpg]]


Dino finds another excuse to draw a wandsmen for an unrelated prompt. Lil doodle based on + some text from [[[a-wandsman-in-the-court-of-the-hanged-king |A Wandsman in the Court of the Hanged King]]] by [[*user Metaphysician]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 23 - Manna Charitable Foundation]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 23 - Manna Charitable Foundation]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/rXQ0WQ4.jpg]]

A little doodle from an endearing little tale, [[[foreign-aid |Foreign Aid]]] by [[*user Drewbear]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 24 - "Nobody"]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 24 - "Nobody"]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/5JxIBzY.png]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/nODUoR0.jpg]]

//FROM THE MOUTH OF A CAUTERIZED RAG DOLL.//

HIHIHIIHIHHI IM. So fucking Normal about the Nobody GOI (its my fav,,) and the [[[the-man-in-the-white-suit-hub |The Man in the White Suit Series]]] by [[*user Rounderhouse]], [[*user Captain Kirby]], [[*user Tufto]], and [[*user Woedenaz]] is my fuckin favorite series on the site. I could go off on an autistic ass rant about it but ehehehehe have this comic I had a lot of fun making it :>

Please note this lil comic uses lyrics from Amygdala's Ragdoll by GHOST! I do not own that song!!

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 25 - Pentagram]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 25 - Pentagram]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/a7xl75S.jpg]]

And now for a drawing of [[[scp-7755 |SCP-7755]]] by [[*user Crow-cat]]! It was a very fun read ^^

[[/tab]]


[[tab Day 26 - dado]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 26 - dado]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/LCgnyTI.jpg]]

And this is. A drawing based on [[[scp-3929 |SCP-3929]]] by [[*user djkaktus]]. Commitment to a bit relating to me and a friend deep-diving the dado tag at 3 AM. Unfortunately 'heavens to betsy i just want to nut' is a phrase we say to eachother on occasion. 

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 27 - The Engineer]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 27 - The Engineer]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/3lDy4D1.jpg]]

Holy shit I finally got around to reading [[[scp-7000 |SCP-7000]]] by [[*user HarryBlank]]. Only took me like a year and a half LMAO. Oh my god I wish I read it sooner it was fucking hilarious and real damn interesting. I love you mr dr wettle
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 28 - Global Occult Coalition]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 28 - Global Occult Coalition]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/VqEdkiH.jpg]]

Aaannd this is a silly doodle based on the fucking hilarious [[[the-first-occult-flame-war |The First Occult Flame War]]] written by [[*user Ralliston]], [[*user Guezma]], and [[*user Zygard]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 29 - Just Girly Things]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 29 - Just Girly Things]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/TThgEKg.jpg]]

Y'know, in a website full of body horror, gore, existential terror and apocalyptic dread - the last thing I'd expect to disgust and unsettle me to my core is some pastel pink blog posts - but god damn ok! This is a doodle based on [[[ella-s-sickly-sweets |Ella's Sickly Sweets]]] by [[*user DianaBerry]]. I'm gonna have to check out more of this group.  
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 30 - Three Portlands]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 30 - Three Portlands]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/oDQ0zuV.png]]

A little doodle based on the wonderful tale [[[the-beat-must-go-on |The Beat Must Go On]]] by [[*user Corax D]]! I remember reading it ages ago and really connecting with it, as the child of a musician. It's such a fun piece.
[[/tab]]


[[tab Day 31 - UNFOUNDED]]
++++ **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 GOITOBER Day 30 - Three Portlands]**

[[image https://i.imgur.com/EkvZdmf.png]]

Holy FUCK I did it. I was,,, honestly not expecting to be able to pull off committing to the whole month but SURPRISE!!
My final piece is of [[[scp-6871 |SCP-6871]]] by [[*user Ralliston]]. Beforehand I'd only read the Finding Asmodeus part of the Unfounded canon, and this was a really interesting piece - and the ending twist (and its implications in terms of Unfounded itself) was very, very fun. 
[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]
author: Dino--Draws
